Aglet.title: Aglet?
Aglet.body: Yup. Aglet. The dictionary definition of the word Aglet is "a metal or plastic tube fixed tightly around each end of a shoelace." If you watched Phineas and Ferb, you probably knew this already. This was just a fun name I made, because it was shoe related for a shoe-based product. Cool, right?

Aglet.title: But Why?
Aglet.body: This was just a tester app for me to launch myself into full stack development. I don't think it's special by any means. It's a cool little project with some average CSS, but nothing good. I used class-based React components and JavaScript, so I'm not entirely proud of this one. But I learned quite a lot from this project. The jump from Aglet to RANT was quite impressive if I'm going to be honest, so clearly in that time, I learned a good amount.
